𒄈 #patrum “knife, sword” 🗡 ≠ 🗡️

𓆫 𒀯𒄈𒋰 Zuqaqīpu •AS.GÍR.pīu Scorpio ϭⲗⲏ 𓆫 𒄈 scorpion 𓋴 𓂋 𓈎 𓏏 𓆫 •sarıḳərbit 𓂓 ḳərbit

𒄈𒍑 GÍR.NITA governaut general <> 𒄈 GÍR ⚔ guerre

𒋼·𒃻𒊕𒄈𒋰 MUL₂-x-ša₂-SAG-GIR₂.TAB β/δ Scorpii

𒈲𒄈 mušⁿĝiri₂ masnakeʳ 𓆓 𓆑 𓆙 𓆚 𓆘
𒈲𒄈 ĝiri₂muš *kŕ̥miš kermi 𓎡 𓄿 𓂓 𓏤 𓆙 dangerous worm KUR

𒄈𒋢𒆠 Girsu 𓊖 (Sumerian Ĝirsu;[1] cuneiform ĝir2-su.ki 𒄈𒋢𒆠)
capital city of Lagash some 25 km NW of Lagash, at the site of modern Tell Telloh, Dhi Qar Governorate, Iraq.

𒀭𒎏𒄈𒋢 • nin-g̃ir₂-su /Ning̃irsuk/ Ningirsu ≈ 𒀭 𒊩𒈠 𒄈𒋢𒆠 NinGirsu ⇔ (chief male god of the Lagaš state) 𒀭 𒊩𒈠 𒅁 𒃼𒊏𒀜 NinUrta Qaradh

Ass #sisi 𒀲𒆳𒊏 ANŠE.KUR.RA(s) घोड़ा ghoṛāˢ > horse
𒀲 𒄈𒉣 anše ĝir2-nun "an equid" #kūdanu ĝir घोड़ा ghoṛāˢ > horse

𒀯𒄈𒋰 Zuqaqīpu Scorpio •S-GÍR-PU (sic!)
𓋴 𓂋 𓈎 𓏏 𓆫 | •sarıḳərbit 𓆫

𒉏𒄈 𐌻𐌰𐌿𐌷𐌼𐌿𐌽𐌹 lauhmuni lightning 𓌳 𓄿 𓄫 𓏏 𓅱 𓏛 𓏥 𒉏𒄈 lightning #birqu בָּרַק بَرَقَ baraqa በረቀ bäräḳä ⲉⲃⲣⲏϭⲉ ebrēce bright 𒄈 парыла parəla <> 𒄈 #patrum 𒄈 GÍR ⲕⲉⲣⲁⲩⲛⲟⲥ "lightning" 𒄈 GÍR ≈ 𒅗𒌑 GU₃U thunder 𒄈 GÍR <> kilat @ Malay "lightning" 𓋴 𓄞 𓂧 𓆊 𓇼 𓏤 | lightning | ⲥⲉⲧⲉⲃⲣⲏϫ √shoot
